text:
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
Bat onal association of
Educational Broadcasters
Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbane, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I have your letter of September 24, regarding
the KPFA assignments. I think the form, submitted
to you. toy Wallace Hamilton is satisfactory to us,
nd I have no objection to your ;roposed amendment
thereof.
With regard to releases from us to you to offer
the anticipated ,rograms on t e tape network, we
will expect to sign one. Si;ce the release is
primarily for your protection, may I suggest that
you submit one which I will sadistically tear apart.
Best of Luck.
Sincerely,
George W, Overton
GWOimi
CG: Hudson
